test_mode.title: The carbon contribution is currently in TEST mode: NO DONATION WILL BE DONATED. If you are not the site owner, please do not contribute.

explanation.title: Make a contribution
explanation.message: The contribution will be entirely donated to the climate project.
explanation.details: With the contribution, you have the possibility of making the carbon footprint of your purchase neutral. The amount of the contribution is automatically calculated on the payment page.
